name: Jewels Mine
description:
Jewels Mine is the 3-Match Jewels game.

###HOW TO PLAY###
Swap Jewels to match 3 or more identical jewels, more the better.
-Classic Mode
When you reach the target score, the level is cleared.
Game over when there is no more moves.

-Action Mode
Destroy all bricks the level is cleared.
Game over when time is over.

-Digger Mode
Dig down up on the yellow line for level clear.
Game over when time is over.


###FEATURES###
- Three Game Modes: Classic, Action, Digger
- Auto Save

Enjoy.
